dmca.title: [EV1-C1321169N] Breach of World Guides Copyright
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
-----Original Message-----

Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [EV1-C1321169N] Breach of World Guides Copyright
Subject: [EV1-C1321169N] Breach of World Guides Copyright

MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Webmaster, 
 
Please could you arrange for our listings to be removed from your pages:

 
http://1438.iofrx.info/
http://1665.qdmihh.info/ 
 
The listings read as follows: 
 
Chattanooga Hotels, Accommodation, Lodging: Hotels in Chattanooga ... 
Other popular types of accommodation in Chattanooga include friendly   
guesthouses, well-known chain motels, swanky luxury hotels and   
extended-stay hotels, ... 
http://www.chattanooga.world-guides.com/chattanooga_hotels.html 
 
Chattanooga Tourism and Tourist Information: Information about ... 
Hotels and accommodation options in Chattanooga are varied and   
include many family run bed and breakfasts, chain motels and modern,   
extended-stay hotels. ... 
http://www.chattanooga.world-guides.com/ 
 
Milan Tourism and Tourist Information: Information about Milan ... 
Some of the most popular lakes in the Milan region include Lake   
Maggiore, Lake Como and Lake Garda, the three largest lakes in   
Italy. ... 
http://www.milan.world-guides.com/ 
 
Thank you for you help and please advise us when this has been done   
so we can close our Breach of Copyright query. 
 
Regards, 
 
Martin 
 
WORLD GUIDES
